note.p: Education: London Hospital; Edinburgh University. MD (1822)
Career: Consulting Physician (Obstetrics) and Lecturer on obstetric and Forensic Medicine, London Hospital; Physician, Royal Maternity Charity; retired to the country due to ill health
Memberships: LRCP (1822); FRCP (1844); Harveian Society (President); Hunterian Society (President); Pathological Society
